com.salesforce.omakase.broadcast

Class SingleInterestBroadcaster<T extends Broadcastable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salesforce.omakase.broadcast.AbstractBroadcaster
      • com.salesforce.omakase.broadcast.SingleInterestBroadcaster<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The expected broadcastable type.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Broadcaster, InterestBroadcaster<T>

    public final class SingleInterestBroadcaster<T extends Broadcastable>
extends AbstractBroadcaster
implements InterestBroadcaster<T>
    An InterestBroadcaster that is interested in only a single broadcast of a particular type.

    Any broadcasts that do not match the expected type will be ignored, and only the first broadcast of the desired type will be stored. All broadcasts, matching or not, will still be passed along broadcast chain if applicable.
